title: Writings of Nichiren Shonin: Doctrine 2
description: This volume, a project of the English Translation Committee of the Nichiren-shu Overseas Propagation Promotion Association (NOPPA), constitutes all 23 writings of Buddhist reformer Nichiren Shonin (1222-1282) included in the Nichiren Shonin Zenshu, Volume Theology 2, published in 1996.
author: Kyotsu Hori
